Segment description: Apple's line of personal computers featuring laptops and desktops, designed with macOS operating system for various user needs.
Key products / services (keywords): MacBook Air; MacBook Pro; iMac; Mac mini; Mac Studio; Mac Pro; macOS

Segment description: Apple's portfolio of digital and support services including advertising, cloud, digital content, payment, and technical support offerings.
Key products / services (keywords): Advertising services; AppleCare; Cloud Services; App Store; Apple Arcade; Apple Fitness+; Apple Music; Apple News+; Apple TV; Apple Card; Apple Pay

Segment description: Apple's products including smartwatches, wireless headphones, spatial computers, media streaming devices, smart speakers, and accessories.
Key products / services (keywords): Apple Watch Series 11; Apple Watch SE 3; Apple Watch Ultra 3; AirPods; AirPods Pro; AirPods Max; Beats products; Apple Vision Pro; Apple TV 4K; HomePod; HomePod mini; Apple-branded accessories; Third-party accessories

Segment description: Apple's line of multipurpose tablets designed with iPadOS, catering to various user needs from casual to professional use.
Key products / services (keywords): iPad Pro; iPad Air; iPad; iPad mini; iPadOS

Segment description: Apple's line of smartphones based on iOS operating system, offering a range of models with advanced features and technology.
Key products / services (keywords): iPhone 17 Pro; iPhone Air; iPhone 17; iPhone 16; iPhone 16e; iOS

Segment description: Google Cloud provides AI-optimized infrastructure, development platforms, and cloud services to help organizations solve business challenges, improve productivity, reduce costs, and drive growth through innovative AI-powered tools and applications.
Key products / services (keywords): Google Cloud Platform; Google Workspace; AI-optimized infrastructure; AI development platform; assistive agents; cloud applications; AI models; business productivity tools

Segment description: Google Services includes consumer-facing products that organize the world’s information and make it universally accessible and useful, helping people find information, get things done, and access entertainment and learning opportunities.
Key products / services (keywords): Google Search; YouTube; Android; Chrome; Gmail; Maps; Play Store; YouTube Partner Program

Segment description: Other Bets comprises non-Google businesses within Alphabet that focus on innovative and moonshot projects aimed at solving big problems and advancing new technologies beyond Google’s core services.
Key products / services (keywords): moonshot projects; innovative technologies; non-Google businesses
